mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.car_id AS "carId", a.car_time AS "carTime", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.longitude AS "longitude", a.speed AS "speed", a.direction AS "direction", a.base_station AS "baseStation", a.gps_locate_status AS "gpsLocateStatus", a.device_status AS "deviceStatus", a.battery_voltage AS "batteryVoltage", a.signal_intensity AS "signalIntensity", a.analog_input_one AS "analogInputOne", a.analog_input_two AS "analogInputTwo", a.sequence_number AS "sequenceNumber", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ocr_driver_travel( id, car_id, car_time, latitude, longitude, speed, direction, base_station, gps_locate_status, device_status, battery_voltage, signal_intensity, analog_input_one, analog_input_two, sequence_number, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{carId}, #{carTime}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{speed}, #{direction}, #{baseStation}, #{gpsLocateStatus}, #{deviceStatus}, #{batteryVoltage}, #{signalIntensity}, #{analogInputOne}, #{analogInputTwo}, #{sequenceNumber}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ocr_driver_travel SET car_id = #{carId}, car_time = #{carTime}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, speed = #{speed}, direction = #{direction}, base_station = #{baseStation}, gps_locate_status = #{gpsLocateStatus}, device_status = #{deviceStatus}, battery_voltage = #{batteryVoltage}, signal_intensity = #{signalIntensity}, analog_input_one = #{analogInputOne}, analog_input_two = #{analogInputTwo}, sequence_number = #{sequenceNumber}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
